sqlReaderQuery.value: select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[DueDateType] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[DueDateType], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}
